lead_paragraph: Many Muslim leaders applauded the F.B.I.’s efforts in the failed bombing plot in Portland, Ore., but some said that cases like that one risk undermining the trust of Muslim communities.
snippet: Many Muslim leaders applauded the F.B.I.’s efforts in the failed bombing plot in Portland, Ore., but some said that cases like that one risk undermining the trust of Muslim communities.

headline.main: Terror Cases Strain Ties With Some Who Can Help
headline.seo: Terror Stings May Strain Relationship Between F.B.I. and Muslim Leaders
headline.print_headline: Terror Cases Strain Ties With Some Who Can Help

byline.original: By WILLIAM YARDLEY and JESSE McKINLEY
byline.contributor: Colin Miner contributed reporting from Portland, Ore.; Isolde Raftery from Eugene, Ore.; and Malia Wollan from San Francisco.
